hymn.title: Cast thou thy care upon the Lord (Alternate Tune)
hymn.category: Comfort in Trials—By the Lord's Care

layout.singingstanza: Cast thou thy care up -- on the Lord, The care that loads thy heart; Take Him this mo -- ment at His word, And let Him do His part.

lyrics.stanza: Cast thou thy care upon the Lord, The care that loads thy heart; Take Him this moment at His word, And let Him do His part.
The need is deep, the care is great, The burden hard to bear; Roll it on Him with all its weight, And leave it resting there.
This heavy thing, it is His gift, His portion, thee to bless; Give it Him back; what He shall lift No more on thee shall press.
Cast all thy care, and not a part, The great things and the small; The Lord's all-loving, mighty heart Has room and thought for all.
